title: Mastering Shell Pipelines for Data Processing
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use pipelines in shell programming. Pipelines, often called pipes, allow you to chain commands together and connect the output of one command to the input of the next. This is useful when you need to process complex or lengthy input.

meta.title: Mastering Shell Pipelines for Data Processing
meta.description: Learn how to use pipelines in shell programming to process complex or lengthy input efficiently.
meta.keywords: shell, pipelines, data processing, command line, Linux
